Metadata.title: AI-Powered Data Processing and Analysis Agent
Metadata.description: DataForge is a website powered by AI agents, allowing users to process and analyze data using natural language without writing any code.

Process.fileExtError: Unsupported file type. Please upload a CSV or Excel file!
Process.fileSizeError: The file size must not exceed 10MB.

questions.t1: DataForge is an online data analysis platform based on AI agents. Users can complete data processing and analysis simply by using natural language.
questions.q2: Do I need to know how to code to use it?
questions.t2: No. DataForge is designed so that non-technical users can easily use it—just type your question.
questions.q3: What kind of data can DataForge handle?
questions.t3: Currently it only supports CSV and Excel. More data sources (such as databases and APIs) will be added in the future.
questions.t4: DataForge uses AI models for processing, so results may not always be accurate. You can export the data for secondary verification.
questions.q5: Do I need to install any software to use DataForge?
questions.t5: No, DataForge is a web-based application and only requires a browser.
questions.q6: Are multiple files or large files supported?
questions.t6: The current version supports a single file (≤10MB). Batch analysis will be available in future versions.

contents.c1: Generate code directly from natural language.
contents.c3: Temporary files are isolated and automatically cleaned.
contents.c4: Operate directly in the browser, no software installation required.
